author: chfast
content: <@892053833121923094> qq about test coding: I'm in `class EOFTest(BaseTest)`. Is there a way to get the test "id"?

author: marioevz
content: not at the moment, but definitely can be added, you would like to pass it to the evmon-eofparse ?

author: chfast
content: No, I'm looking for duplicated EOF tests ðŸ™‚ Any other way to find out where `self.data` comes from?

author: marioevz
content:
Try this branch: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/tree/add-request-id-to-test-tag

And self.tag in EOFTest will have the test name id

author: chfast
content: Can you emit a warning in a test?

author: marioevz
content:
Yes:
```python
import warnings
...
warnings.warn("Something is not right")
```
